text: @morningmika @realDonaldTrump You disgusting people! Just wish his family sympathy! My friends Mom died from Covid19 just sitting in a retirement home! No rally just sitting in her home! Thousands upon thousands protesting tightly together isn't a problem. Karma will come for you!
